                               int accessID)
                        throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                               SettingException
Description copied from interface: ChannelInternal
Sets all device settings which get set if this channel is activated. All previous settings get deleted.

Specified by:
setChannelSettings in interface ChannelInternal
Parameters:
settings - New settings for the channel.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException
SettingException

                             throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                                    DeviceException

setShutter

public void setShutter(java.lang.String deviceID,
                       int accessID)
                throws SettingException,
                       MicroscopeLockedException
Description copied from interface: ChannelInternal
Sets the shutter device of this channel. The shutter is automatically opened shortly before the image process and closed afterwards. Set to null if the shutter should not be opened and closed automatically.

Specified by:
setShutter in interface ChannelInternal
Parameters:
deviceID - The device ID of the shutter.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
SettingException
MicroscopeLockedException

getShutter

public java.lang.String getShutter()
Description copied from interface: ChannelInternal
Returns the device ID of the shutter of this channel. The shutter is automatically opened shortly before the image process and closed afterwards. Returns null if the shutter is not be opened and closed automatically.

Specified by:
getShutter in interface ChannelInternal
Returns:
The device ID of the shutter associated to this device.
